title: Devrim
creator_contributor_role: Migrant Women's Film Group, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conjugal violence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women immigrants
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women immigrants
description: Looks at the situation of a young Turkish woman who finds herself in an impossible marriage. Explores her dilemmas, her conditioning both as a migrant and as a woman, and shows how she eventually deals with these. The program is told from a migrant's perspective, having been written, produced and directed by a group of six migrant women from different countries and backgrounds. Raises issues about migrant women's lives in Australia, particularly domestic violence.
